Author: 柳条08
Text: 经朋友介绍这个在当地最好的酒店，但是入住后让我有点失望，首先我是上午到的，酒店以没有空房间为由不准提前办理入住，等我下午六点半返回酒店办理入住时，因为我要不吸烟的房间，办理入住最少耽误了半个小时，最后还是给我办的双床房，在公寓楼的房间，空调很吵，房间的窗帘竟然没有遮阳功能，与星级酒店不符…….
Translation: This hotel was introduced by a friend as the best hotel in the area, but I was a little disappointed after checking in. First of all, I arrived in the morning. The hotel did not allow early check-in on the grounds that there was no vacant room. When I returned to the hotel to check in at 6:30 in the afternoon Because I wanted a non-smoking room, check-in was delayed for at least half an hour. In the end, I got a twin room. In the apartment building, the air conditioner was very noisy, and the curtains in the room did not have sunshade function. Doesn't match...

Author: QICHANG
Title: Excellent
Text: 附近地區較優質的酒店
Translation: Better quality hotels in nearby areas

Author: jiyoung
Text: 酒店整体环境不错，早餐中式的，一般，，可以在泳池边吃，就是热一点 ，房间这次定的是公寓式套房，个人觉得隔的有点憋的慌，下次还是定那种普通的房间。
Translation: The overall environment of the hotel is good, the breakfast is Chinese style, average, you can eat by the pool, but it is hotter, the room is an apartment-style suite this time, I personally feel that the distance is a bit suffocating, next time I will book an ordinary room .

Author: Lam Lam
Text: Đây là lần thứ hai mình chọn lưu trú ở Becamex Hotel New City, nhưng thật sự trải nghiệm lần này của mình khá tệ. Trưa ngày mình nhận phòng, mình tới trước nên check-in trước và có báo cho phía lễ tân khách sạn là tầm chiều tối bạn mình sẽ tới. Sáng ngày thứ nhất bọn mình có cùng nhau dùng bữa sáng tại nhà hàng của khách sạn, bạn mình là người cầm thẻ phòng để check chỗ quầy thì nhân viên bảo phòng chỉ có một khách, sau đó họ kiểm tra lại xác nhận có hai khách. Xem như đó là sai sót nhất thời đáng lẽ nó nên được sửa chữa. Sang tới ngày thứ hai mình dùng bữa và cũng gặp tình huống như thế. Tại sao các bạn không kiểm tra kỹ thông tin? Hi vọng trải nghiệm lần tới của mình không tệ hại như vậy?
Translation: This is the second time I choose to stay at Becamex Hotel New City, but my experience this time was really bad. At noon on the day I checked in, I arrived first, so I checked in first and informed the hotel reception that my friend would come in the evening. In the morning of the first day, we had breakfast together at the hotel restaurant, my friend was the one holding the room card to check the counter, the staff told the room there was only one guest, then they checked to confirm there were two. guest. See it as a temporary mistake that should have been fixed. On the second day, I had a meal and had the same situation. Why don't you double check the information? Hope my next experience isn't as bad?

Author: Wei
Title: 非常好的体验
Text: 早餐，卫生状况，员工很友好，有个很大的泳池
Translation: Breakfast, cleanliness, friendly staff, and a big swimming pool

Author: SUNGGYU
Title: 빈증 출장 숙소
Text: 담배 냄새. 소파 청결 상태 불량
Translation: cigarette smell. Poor sofa cleanliness

Text: 新城唯一的五星级酒店，多半都是住中国人
Translation: Most of the only five-star hotels in Binh Duong are Chinese people

Author: zhou-jy
Text: 酒店非常整洁，房间宽敞，舒适。早餐非常丰富
Translation: The hotel is very clean and the rooms are spacious and comfortable. very good breakfast

Text: 很不错的呢
Translation: very good

Author: WANG
Title: 非常好的酒店
Text: 住很多次了，酒店环境，位置都很好，工作人员热情，中文也很好，👍
Translation: I have stayed many times, the hotel environment and location are very good, the staff are friendly, and the Chinese is also very good, 👍

Author: Sam Nguyen
Text: Một trải nghiệm quá tệ ! Nhân viên lễ tân tay đôi với khách , 4 người đi trong đó 1 người quên mang giấy tờ tuỳ thân có hình ảnh nhưng ko chấp nhận! Bảo lãnh cũng ko cho .đúng kiểu phục vụ của những năm 90 tk trước. Tạm biệt và không hẹn gặp
Translation: Such a bad experience ! Front desk staff arguing directly with guests, 4 people go in which 1 person forgot to bring photo identification but did not accept, even with the peole can guarantee. Typical service style of 90s. Goodbye and no see them again

Author: PHU HO
Text: Không gian thoáng, dịch vụ chuyên nghiệp
Translation: Open space, professional service

Author: trung nguyen
Text: Rất tốt
Translation: Very good

Author: _TXTHjk515is****
Text:
Good hotel and nice place
Food is good test
Clean room
Lovely people
Translation:
Good hotel and nice place
Food is good test
Clean room
Lovely people

Author: Thien Dam Van
Text: Đồ uống rất tuyệt vời
Translation: Very good drinks

Author: 楊守安
Text: 住一個禮拜今天剛住，網路有時收不到。
Translation: I just moved in today after staying for a week, and sometimes I can't receive it on the Internet.

Author: HUY DUONG TRAN
Text: Nơi chạy giải Halfmarathon Bình Dương
Translation: The place to run the Binh Duong Halfmarathon

Author: WANG
Title: 非常Good
Text: 出行方便，环境好，不知道住了多少次了，非常好
Translation: It's convenient to travel and the environment is good. I don't know how many times I've stayed here. It's very good

Author: Mengchun
Title: CP 高
Text: 樓下 family mart 方便
Translation: The Family Mart downstair is convenient

Author: Mengchun
Title: 性價比高
Text: 含有免痔馬桶 ，早餐多元
Translation: Contains a hemorrhoid-free toilet, and the breakfast is diverse

Author: E0169****
Text: 房間越來越舊。低樓層濕氣重
Translation: The rooms are getting older. Humidity on lower floors

Author: Shelly Mu
Text: 房間很大，服務親切早餐好吃 但是枕頭太軟了 雖然有四顆枕頭但是沒一顆好躺😂😂 整體而言很推薦
Translation: The room is big, the service is friendly, the breakfast is delicious, but the pillows are too soft. Although there are four pillows, none of them are comfortable to lie on. Overall, it is recommended

Author: KAZUTAKA
Title: これからに期待
Text:
新都心に立つホテルで、部屋は広く、設備も整っているが、周りに商業施設は少ない。
これから発展していく都市と何年も前から言われているが、コロナの影響でなかなか開発が進んでいない様子。
それでもこれからの発展には期待したい。
Translation:
This hotel is located in the new city center, and the rooms are spacious and well-equipped, but there are few commercial facilities around.
It has been said for many years that it is a city that will develop from now on, but it seems that development has not progressed due to the influence of Covid-19.
Still, I have high hopes for future developments.

Author: mo
Title: Exceptional
Text: 飯店位置極佳
Translation: Hotel location is excellent

Author: YiTe
Title: Nice hotel
Text: I booked the suite, everything was fine except one thing .... don't know how to adjust the temperature of the AC .....
Translation: I booked the suite, everything was fine except one thing .... don't know how to adjust the temperature of the AC .....

Author: mo
Title: Exceptional
Text: 早餐 好好吃！
Translation: Breakfast is delicious!

Author: Oanh Nguyen
Text: Vị trí đẹp ....Vip nhé
Translation: Nice location....Vip

Author: 김희은
Text: 베트남 럭셔리 호텔~ 방도 쾌적하고 조식도 맛있고 로비도 근사하다. 일정때문에 짧게 머물러서 아쉽다
Translation: Luxury Hotel in Vietnam~ The room is pleasant, the breakfast is delicious, and the lobby is nice. It's a pity that I stayed short due to my schedule.

Author: Lydia qi
Text: 值得续住 环境卫生 早餐都不错
Translation: Worth continuing to stay, sanitation and breakfast are good

Author: M510014****
Text: 有个重要的事情要说下，这酒店的名字应该叫平阳新城贝卡梅克斯酒店。特别从机场打出租车到酒店的时候，切记不要讲到土龙木，司机会把你送到土龙木的贝卡梅克斯酒店。酒店住的还舒适
Translation: There is an important thing to say, the name of this hotel should be Becamex Hotel in Binh Duong New City. Especially when taking a taxi from the airport to the hotel, remember not to mention Thu Dau Mot, the driver will send you to the Bekamex Hotel in Thu Dau Mot. The hotel is comfortable

Author: 撕不坏
Text: Continental breakfast, nice service
Translation: Continental breakfast, nice service

Author: phạm
Title: Tệ
Text: Khách sạn quá nhiều quy định cho khách, k nên ở
Translation: The hotel has too many rules for guests, should not stay

Author: 心蓝1129
Text: 开发区的一个酒店 周边都是工厂 适合出差 旁边中国餐厅挺多
Translation: A hotel in the development zone is surrounded by factories, suitable for business trips, and there are many Chinese restaurants next to it

Author: Vincz
Text: 早餐很好，游泳池很好，
Translation: Good breakfast, nice swimming pool,

Author: Nguyễn Phương Nguyên
Text: I only had a coffee downstairs. Good.
Translation: I only had a coffee downstairs. Good.

Text: 特别特别不好
Translation: very bad

Title: Wonderful
Text:
溫泉非常棒，正宗的硫磺泉，早晚餐都很不錯.
離纜車站有點距離
Translation:
The hot spring is very good, authentic sulfur spring, breakfast and dinner are very good.
A bit far from the cable car station

Author: Bryce
Title: nice to stay here if working in the area
Text:
good appartement size with balcony.
busy breakfast
Translation:
good appartement size with balcony.
busy breakfast

Author: _yt13448****
Text: 早餐好，环境佳
Translation: Good breakfast and nice environment

Author: Hien Do
Text: Restaurant here having cuisine of Vietnam and other nations. Decoration great and good price. Service and taste also good. Highly recommend
Translation: Restaurant here having cuisine of Vietnam and other nations. Decoration great and good price. Service and taste also good. Highly recommend

Author: Jason Teo
Text: Nothing much nearby except for a Hikari. Room is spacious, will be better if they have bath tub
Translation: Nothing much nearby except for a Hikari. Room is spacious, will be better if they have bath tub

Author: Shang
Title: Did not like the apartment style room!
Text: Did not seem to change the pillow case?  Weird smell when you sleep on it. I would want to stay at the hotel section of the complex instead of the Apartment section next time.
Translation: Did not seem to change the pillow case?  Weird smell when you sleep on it. I would want to stay at the hotel section of the complex instead of the Apartment section next time.

Author: Rika
Title: Very Good
Text: 新都市の中心で便利 レストランエリアのヒカリに近い
Translation: Convenient in the center of the new city Close to Hikari in the restaurant area

Author: Anh Tuấn Đỗ
Text: Hotel lớn và sang trọng nhất trong khu vực. Phong cách làm việc chuyên nghiệp
Translation: The biggest and most luxurious hotel in the area. Professional working style

Author: Buu
Title: Nới ở lý tưởng
Text: Rất ok
Translation: Very OK

Author: Lin Jaydon
Text: 員工誠信讓人疑問，12/13check out，當天晚上發現錢忘在房間，櫃檯卻說找3次找不到，錢會自己長腳跑掉？還是房務拿走？誰知道？對越南人的評價：不予置評
Translation: The honesty of the staff is doubtful. On 12/13 check out, I found that I forgot the money in the room that night, but the counter said that I couldn’t find it after searching for it 3 times. Will the money run away by itself? Or housekeeping? who knows?

Author: Marc Petrine
Text: Convenient for factory visits but too far from HCMC. Service is cumbersome to an American but probably normal for Asia. Restaurant if FANTASTIC! Make sure you grab breakfast. Room was clean and modern. Great shower.
Translation: Convenient for factory visits but too far from HCMC. Service is cumbersome to an American but probably normal for Asia. Restaurant if FANTASTIC! Make sure you grab breakfast. Room was clean and modern. Great shower.

Author: nelsontaob
Text: 设施非常到位 尤其是早餐值得推荐 属于高级的商旅酒店
Translation: The facilities are in place, especially the breakfast is recommended. It is a high-end business hotel

Text: 新城不多的选择。游泳池很好，早餐丰盛，隔音很好，位置很好，非常方便。
Translation: There are not many choices in the New city. The swimming pool is very good, the breakfast is rich, the sound insulation is very good, the location is very good, very convenient.

Author: Adelyn
Title: Exceptional
Text: will definitely recommend
Translation: will definitely recommend

Text: 平阳新城区最好的酒店，设施如健身房都不错，床有点硬
Translation: The best hotel in Binhduong New City, the facilities such as the gym are good, the bed is a bit hard

Author: KENTO
Title: いいところ
Text:
外観は古く見えるが中身は一流で清潔
朝食も充実してる。近くの展示会が開催されてるときは人で混みあう
Translation:
The outside looks old but the inside is first class and clean
Breakfast is substantial, too. Crowded when there is an exhibition nearby.

Author: Keeyung Choi
Text: 오랜 호텔이지만 럭셔리해서 좋아요 Nearby activities: 주변시설이 약해요
Translation: It's an old hotel, but I like it because it's luxurious Nearby activities: The surrounding facilities are weak

Author: Phuc Hung Nguyen
Text: Phục vụ tốt
Translation: Good service

Author: NTT Chanel's
Text: Tuyệt vời
Translation: Very good

Author: 남충우
Text: Nearby activities: 골프
Translation: Nearby activities: Golf

Author: 109 Hinograb
Text: nơi tổ chức sự kiện có dịch vụ tốt
Translation: event venue with good service

Author: Yuchieh
Title: 整體乾淨舒適 會再住宿
Text:
房間大 性價比超高
早餐豐富滿意.
飯店周邊沒什麼娛樂 只有樓下便利商店
Translation:
Big room, great value for money
The breakfast is rich and satisfying.
There is no entertainment around the hotel, only the convenience store downstairs

Author: Pingqiang Zhou
Text: 环境很好，服务好
Translation: The environment is very good and the service is good

Author: Hữu Tài Nguyễn
Text: Khách sạn đẳng cấp tại Tp mới Bình Dương của tập đoàn Becamex. Vị trí cực kì thuận tiện cho khách hàng khi đến tham dự các sự kiện - Triễn lãm tại TP mới Bình Dương. Khách sạn đạt tiêu chuẩn 5 sao nhưng chỉ để 4 sao. Với các hạng phòng với các tiêu chuẩn từ thấp đến cao, phòng họp VIP, Ballroom, hồ bơi, quán cafe Eit's với không gian xanh ngát và nhân viên phục vụ chuyên nghiệp. Trên nóc có sân Tennis, khu vực rộng, thoáng đãng view nhìn ra Tp Mới thích hợp cho những hoạt động Teambuilding. Nơi đây cũng có sảnh tổ chức lễ cưới trong nhà hoặc ngoài trời. Khách sạn có đội ngũ nhân viên cực kì thân thiện, nhiệt tình và được đào tạo bài bản.
Translation: Luxury hotel in Binh Duong New City of Becamex Group. The location is extremely convenient for customers to attend events - exhibitions in Binh Duong New City. The hotel is 5 star standard but only 4 star. With room types from low to high standards, VIP meeting room, Ballroom, swimming pool, Eit's cafe with green space and professional service staff. On the roof there is a tennis court, a large, open area overlooking the New City, suitable for Teambuilding activities. It also has an indoor or outdoor wedding reception hall. The hotel has an extremely friendly, enthusiastic and well-trained staff.

Author: Hen Nguyen
Text: Ngay mặt tiền ngả 4 Hùng Vương và Lý Thái Tổ, liền kề trung tâm hành chính tỉnh Bình Dương, đối diện trung tâm triễn lãm quốc tế vừa khánh thành; trung tâm thành phố mới, lân cận khu dân cư hiện hữu Tổ hợp có bãi đỗ xe ngoài trời rất rộng, gồm: Khách sạn có sảnh đón tiếp rất rộng, trang trí đẹp mắt, hồ bơi khu bên cạnh có sảnh kết nối sang đường, view ngắm đẹp, có quán bar; sảnh đó bên phải có quán cà phê và ăn uống nhiều góc chụp hình đẹp; nhà hàng  tầng 1 với sảnh tiệc lớn,… Không gian nghỉ ngơi, hội nghị, tiệc đẳng cấp của tỉnh BD
Translation: Right in front of the 4 Hung Vuong and Ly Thai To intersections, adjacent to the administrative center of Binh Duong province, opposite the recently inaugurated internationalConvention Hall; New city center, adjacent to existing residential area The complex has a very large outdoor car park, including: The hotel has a very large reception hall, beautifully decorated, a swimming pool next to a luxury connecting lobby road, beautiful view, bar; That lobby on the right has a cafe and dining with many beautiful photo corners; 1st floor restaurant with large banquet hall,… Space for relaxation, conference, party class of BD

Author: 15o6281 luuduchoa
Text: Nhà hàng cũng ngon nhà hàng làm trễ
Translation: The restaurant is also good. The restaurant is late-opening

Author: honghuy tu
Text: Giá hơi cao.
Translation: Expensive price

Author: fc****
Text: 在新城这边算是比较好的酒店了，酒店就在政府大楼后面，前台多少都会点中文，基本沟通没什么问题。房间空调要开一会才有效果…卫生个方面也不错，性价比还可以…但在这边算不便宜的了…
Translation: It is considered a relatively good hotel in Binh Duong. The hotel is just behind the government building. The front desk can speak Chinese, so there is no problem with basic communication. The air conditioner in the room needs to be turned on for a while to be effective... The sanitation is also good, and the price/performance ratio is okay... But it's not cheap here...

Author: Ryan
Title: Quite and Decent place
Text: This is a decent place to stay at for a business trip. It is quiet and reasonable.
Translation: This is a decent place to stay at for a business trip. It is quiet and reasonable.

Author: daylaixe binhphuoc
Text: Sang trọng, vị trí tốt, phục vụ tận tình, chuyên nghiệp.
Translation: Luxury, good location, dedicated service, professional.

Author: Nghĩa Nguyễn
Text: Phục vụ chu đáo, tuyệt vời
Translation: Great, attentive service

Author: Hương Dương
Text: Khách sạn đẹp, yên tĩnh, phòng hiện đại và rất ổn, nhân viên lễ phép nhẹ nhàng
Translation: The hotel is beautiful, quiet, the room is modern and very good, the staff is polite and gentle

Author: Jack HOANG
Text: Tiệc cưới không gian sang trọng
Translation: Luxurious wedding venue

Author: Cheng Tseng
Text: I'll be back soon.
Translation: I'll be back soon.

Author: Ng R
Title: Decent hotel
Text: Fast check in, friendly staffs with good command of English. Room is clean, and comfortable. Breakfast buffet has a good variety of food served. Only feedback is the location is far away from downtown and you will need to take a taxi for about 15mins (8km). For dinner, there is only 1 restaurant available on site
Translation: Fast check in, friendly staffs with good command of English. Room is clean, and comfortable. Breakfast buffet has a good variety of food served. Only feedback is the location is far away from downtown and you will need to take a taxi for about 15mins (8km). For dinner, there is only 1 restaurant available on site

Author: Ivano
Title: Still good as before
Text: Good hotel, clean and good staff
Translation: Good hotel, clean and good staff

Author: Shahrani
Title: Exceptional
Text: Best hotel in binh duong
Translation: Best hotel in binh duong

Author: Việt Hà Hoàng
Text: Tiệc cưới không gian sang trọng
Translation: Luxurious wedding venue

Author: Ronald
Title: Better than expected!
Text:
My colleague and I were here in this area for a business trip. And we are pretty happy to find this hotel in the area. The standards exceeded our expectation, the rooms were clean and comfortable. Breakfast is pretty good as well. 
There are restaurants nearby, so the location is pretty good. Would stay again when we are back.
Translation:
My colleague and I were here in this area for a business trip. And we are pretty happy to find this hotel in the area. The standards exceeded our expectation, the rooms were clean and comfortable. Breakfast is pretty good as well. 
There are restaurants nearby, so the location is pretty good. Would stay again when we are back.

Author: Virginia
Title: Exceptional
Text: Hotel is literally in a new city. Need to walk some distance to the few available eateries.  If not, settle for the restaurant, cafe or room service.  Great food from hotel's restaurant. Very friendly hotel staff.
Translation: Hotel is literally in a new city. Need to walk some distance to the few available eateries.  If not, settle for the restaurant, cafe or room service.  Great food from hotel's restaurant. Very friendly hotel staff.

Author: Tu Nguyễn
Text: Đã đến và trải nghiệm, rất oke nhé
Translation: Stayed and experienced it, it's very good

Author: PAMM SINGH
Text: Awesome property
Translation: Awesome property

Author: Văn Nhật Phương
Text: Gia đình tôi hay ghé nơi đây
Translation: My family often visit here

Author: KATSUNORI
Title: 1ベットルーム　スイート　キングベット　One Bedroom Suite King
Text: 部屋はフロントとは別棟のアパートメントで、キッチンがあり、内装は簡素でしたが、小学生の子供と3人で過ごすのには十分でした。部屋にはテラスがあり、8階でしたが周りには高い建物が無いので、見晴らしはよかったです。朝食はプールを挟んで向かいの1階にあるレストランで、バイキング形式、麺はフォーとバンカン、卵もオムレツ等その場で調理してくれます。フルーツの種類も多く、無くなると違う果物を補充していました。1時間までは無料のレンタル自転車があり、近くの公園で、子供が乗る練習を出来て喜んでました。ホテルの周りには歩いて行けるところに蕎麦屋の克があり、中華料理屋もたくさんあるので食事は困りません。バンナムテーマパークへはバイクで15分くらい、動物園は大人15万VND,子供は4万VND、親子で遊べるアスレチックは、大人10万VND,子供5万VNDでした、プールもあるようですが今回は利用していません。パーク内を移動する電気自動車は無料で、とても広い施設なので移動するだけでも楽しいです。
Translation: The room was an apartment in a separate building from the front desk, and had a kitchen. There was a terrace in the room, and although it was on the 8th floor, there were no tall buildings around, so the view was good. Breakfast is a restaurant on the first floor across the pool, buffet style, noodles are pho and bunkang, eggs are cooked on the spot, such as omelets. There were many types of fruits, and when they ran out, they replenished different fruits. There is a free rental bicycle for up to 1 hour, and I was happy that my child could practice riding in a nearby park. There is a soba restaurant Katsu within walking distance around the hotel, and there are many Chinese restaurants, so you don't have to worry about eating. It takes about 15 minutes by motorbike to the Burnham theme park, the zoo is 150,000 VND for adults, 40,000 VND for children, and the athletics where parents and children can play was 100,000 VND for adults, 50,000 VND for children.There seems to be a pool, but this time Not used. The electric cars that move around the park are free, and it's a very large facility, so it's fun just to move around.

Author: TW
Title: 平陽地區的最佳首選
Text: 很標準的星級飯店，整體非常舒適，住了好幾年，在一樓新開了全家超商，更是方便。
Translation: It's a standard star-rated hotel. It's very comfortable overall. I've lived here for several years. A new Family Mart is opened on the first floor, which is even more convenient.

Author: ヒロヒロ
Text: 2年ぶりに伺いまして ホテル周辺も様変わりしてました。 ロビー横cafeの隣にファミマできてましたね。 便利です。 部屋は 大きめ冷蔵庫にキッチン＆シンク付きにて 軽い料理出来ます。 空調も完備、よく冷えます。 アメニティも充実、苦労しません。 お風呂はシャワーのみ、の部屋ですが。 ベッドも大きく空調もベッドルームにもあるのでグッスリ寝れます。 大きなTV有りますが点けてません。 また利用させてもらいます。
Translation: I visited for the first time in two years, and the area around the hotel has changed completely. Family Mart was made next to the cafe next to the lobby. Convenient. The room has a large refrigerator, kitchen and sink, so you can cook light meals. It is fully air-conditioned and cools well. Amenity is enriched, too and does not struggle. The bath is a room with a shower only. The bed is big and there is an air conditioner in the bedroom, so you can sleep well. There is a large TV, but it is not turned on. I will use it again.

Text: 房间一般 设施还行 重点是有个前台态度恶劣 应该是个新人 没有服务意识 一副高高在上的样子念规章制度 不懂微笑服务 不考虑客人实际情况 死脑筋 三番五次为难客人 很影响整体体验 这种人招来干嘛的 差评!!!
Translation: The general facilities in the room are okay. The key point is that there is a front desk with a bad attitude. He must be a newcomer with no sense of service. He looks superior. He reads the rules and regulations, does not understand the service with a smile and does not consider the actual situation of the guests. Bad reviews!!!

Translation: The attitude of the service staff is very good. There is a 24-hour supermarket outside on the first floor, which is very convenient. There is a lot of space. If you don't want to stay in the room, you can take a walk in the atrium and nearby. very quiet.
